meta_info.name: VERSION
meta_info.description: Abstract model of one Version within a Version container, containing data, commit audit trail, and the identifier of its Contribution.

functions.name: uid
functions.meaning: Unique identifier of this `VERSION`, in the form of an `{object_id, a version_tree_id, creating_system_id}` triple, where the `_object_id_` has the same value as the containing `VERSIONED_OBJECT _uid_`.

functions.name: preceding_version_uid
functions.meaning: Unique identifier of the version of which this version is a modification; Void if this is the first version.

functions.name: lifecycle_state
functions.meaning: Lifecycle state of this version; coded by openEHR vocabulary `version lifecycle state`.

functions.name: canonical_form
functions.meaning: A canonical serial form of this Version, suitable for generating reliable hashes and signatures.

functions.name: owner_id
functions.meaning: Copy of the owning `VERSIONED_OBJECT._uid_` value; extracted from the local `_uid_` property's `_object_id_`.

functions.name: is_branch
functions.meaning: True if this Version represents a branch. Derived from `_uid_` attribute.

attributes.name: contribution
attributes.description: Contribution in which this version was added.

attributes.name: signature
attributes.description: OpenPGP digital signature or digest of content committed in this Version.

attributes.name: commit_audit
attributes.description: Audit trail corresponding to the committal of this version to the `VERSIONED_OBJECT`.
